Show durability only when button is held

Enabling this option will allow you to always view an items durability by holding the button. 
 The other two options thus get disabled.
Whether or not to show durability when item durability is full.
Enable when item has no durability left

Whether or not to show durability when item durability is 0.
E.g. A Broken Elytra.
Separator between current and max damage
Will be taken as is, by default there's spaces around the slash.
The following color codes are accepted:
This is the color when there's more than 60% left.
This is the color when there's between 60% and 30% left.
This is the color when there's less than 30% left.

This is the color when there's exactly 0 left.
E.g. A Broken Elytra.

This is the color of the max durability.
A.k.a. the number on the right side of the separator.
